It's the English dub version, as mentioned in the description. Personally, I thought the dub was incredibly well acted and suited the movie perfectly. Of course if you're not a fan of dubs, you can seek out the original elsewhere.

A/V are both solid. The visuals are an interesting style. Some of it is gorgeous, other parts looks a little off to me, but that's not the rip, it's the way the movie was made.

Anyway, thoroughly enjoyable movie. Strong characters, plot and action. Great visuals. Well worth the download.
